response.overview: A submarine expedition to salvage the remains of Mechagodzilla is thwarted by a massive dinosaur named Titanosaurus. An Interpol investigation leads biologist Ichinose to uncover the work of Dr. Mafune and his mysterious daughter Katsura. Aligned with the Black Hole Aliens, Katsura's life becomes entwined with the resurrected machine.
response.tagline: It has become even more enraged! It has even more powerful weapons! Mechagodzilla has been resurrected!
response.title: Terror of Mechagodzilla

release_dates.note: West German release titled "The Brood of the Devil".
Audifilm Paris/Universel Exportation release titled "The Monsters of the Lost Continent".
Miracle Films release titled "Monsters from an Unknown Planet". Features mild censoring. Exact date unknown.
Release titled "Destroy Kong! The Earth is in Danger!". Exact date unknown.
Release titled "Monsters of the Lost Continent"
Bob Conn Enterprises release titled "The Terror of Godzilla". Heavily censored, trimmed to 79-minutes. Uses the Toho export dub. Exact date unknown.
United Productions of America (UPA) 89-minute extended cut. Features new 6-minute prolog and mild censoring. Uses the Toho export dub. Also referred to as "The Terror of Mechagodzilla".
